title: Introduction to Biotechnology
introduction: Biotechnology involves the use of biological systems, organisms, or their derivatives to develop new technologies, products, or applications.
details: Biotechnology finds applications in various fields, including medicine, agriculture, environmental science, and industrial processes. It has led to advancements such as genetic engineering, biopharmaceuticals, and biofuel production. Learning about biotechnology involves understanding genetic manipulation techniques, bioprocessing, and ethical considerations in biotechnology research.
